title: Zed mimicked ability glitch

embed.description: Hey guys, This is a video I made concerning the glitch with zed's shadows where they won't mimic your abilities if you're really far away from them. Link to the original reddit thread: http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/2pk5z1/zeds_mimicked_abilities/ Sorry for the FRAPS frame drops, hope you can still enjoy the video.

body:
Hey everyone. If you play zed often, you might have noticed that sometimes your shadows don't mimic your abilites properly when you're further away from them. This is a video I made about this where I test out a few scenarios to try and recreate this glitch. 

 I really wanna raise awareness about this issue because I don't think its intended so a fix would be great!!
